tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.grid_tools.6 INPUT $INPUT MODE $MODE METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: MODE
param.label: Neighbourhood
param.help: Neumann: the four horizontally and vertically neighboured cells; Moore: all eight adjacent cells

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Closes one cell gaps using the arithmetic mean, median, majority or minority value of the surrounding cell values. If the target is not set, the changes will be stored to the original grid.
